text: “Ezɨ Geran otarim Simei, a Bahurimɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazim, a Benjaminɨn anabamɨn mav, a uaghan iti. Kɨ tɨghar Mahanaimɨn mangamin dughiamɨn, aruer kamra a bar akar kuraba na ganɨga, egha na gasɨghasɨghasa Godɨn azangsɨsi. Egha a ua iza Jordanɨn Fanemɨn na batozɨma, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziamɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim gamua ghaze, kɨ a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan kogham.
